column4: I am running ubuntu 6.06 on my thinkpad x40. When I install kismet and ethereal through synaptic and then
later on reboot I am unable to log in with my user again. Does anyone know why?
I am running ubuntu 6.06 on my thinkpad x40. When I install kismet and ethereal through synaptic and then later on reboot I am unable to log in with my user again. Does anyone know why?
try running a failsafe session? It probably has nothing to do with kismet or ethereal
